CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.CONTACT_POINT: Direction de l'achat et de la commande publique

TITLE.P: Implementation of a technical assistance project within the framework of the AFD-ENPARD programme for access to agricultural finance for small scale semi-commercial farms and cooperatives in Georgia

SHORT_DESCR.P: 1)1st phase: Detailed design (identification of the small-scale dynamic semi-commercial farms and promising cooperatives, the design of an appropriate advisory scheme, identification of innovative finance tools, identification of the ad hoc expertise needed by the financial institutions and in particular partner MFIs).

2) 2nd phase: Implementation of the Pilot Advisory Scheme and complementary activities (towards financial inclusion of the small-scale dynamic semi-commercial farms and promising cooperatives) (pilot advisory network scheme, implementation of innovative tools, Ad hoc expertise to financial institutions (particularly partner MFIs)
3) Tasks during all phases: Contribution to the policy dialogue on the agricultural sector and particularly on agricultural finance in the country; Monitoring, reporting, and auditing.
Services will be financed by European Neighbourhood Investment Facility (NIF) Trust Fund (TF).
The objective of the assignment: a consulting firm in charge of the implementation of a technical assistance program.
1) To provide final beneficiaries (semi-commercial farms and cooperatives) with on-field capacity-building support, thus increasing their bankability and financial inclusion in the long run, and,

2) to provide some limited ad hoc support to other stakeholders such as local financial institutions (in particular the 2 partner MFIs, in order to leverage the Proparco credit lines) willing to increase their financing to the small-scale farms and cooperatives.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: — Criteria 1: Proven expertise of the consulting firm in providing consulting services in the field of agricultural extension (including farm management and financial education) and agricultural financing (80 %),
— Criteria 2: Proven expertise of the consulting firm in Georgia or similar middle income country (10 %),
— Criteria 3: Financial capacity of the consulting firm (10 %).

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: ENPARD, the European Neighbourhood Programme for Agriculture and Rural Development

INFO_ADD.P: Deadline for asking questions:
— February, 7th 2018, 23:59 (Paris time).
The total amount of the services shall not exceed 4 000 000 EUROS including all taxes (ie 3 333 333 EUROS HT in the case of non-exemption from VAT).
The price of the services is fixed.

SUITABILITY.P: — the application letter DC1 or equivalent (see attachment or form available at the following address: http://www.economie.gouv.fr/daj/formulaires-declaration-du-candidat),
— a copy of the extract of the registration in the Register of companies - Kbis in France or equivalent - less than three months old,

— a declaration on honor stating that the applicant has fulfilled obligations relating to the payment of social security contributions or the payment of taxes in accordance with the legal provisions of the country in which they are established or with those of the country of the contracting authority or those of the country where the contract is to be performed. Subcontractors may also be asked to submit a declaration,

— the selected applicants shall provide as a proof in support of the declaration a copy of the certificates. In case of not providing the above-mentioned proof, the selection of the applicant shall not be confirmed and the applicant ranked after shall be selected.
Each member of consortium and subcontractor shall provide the same documents. shall provide the same documents (nevertheless, the subcontractor shall not provide the application letter).

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: — a statement of the applicant’s gross revenue for the most-recent past three years and a detail of revenue from consulting services featured in this Call for EOI. In case the company is a newly created one and cannot produce its turnover for 2016 or 2017, it is invited to give a detailed overview of its financial capabilities by all means,
— a proof of a valid professional insurance from an insurance company.
Each member and subcontractor of consortium shall provide the same documents.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Overall turnover for the year 2016 (or 2017 if available) of the company or the group of companies (in the case of consortia) above 6 M€. In case the company is a newly created one and cannot produce its turnover for 2016 or 2017, it is invited to give a detailed overview of its financial capabilities by all means.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: — a list of the main consulting services delivered during the last three years, detailing their value and date, sorted by private or public sector customer(s). Delivery of consulting services should be proven by customer statements or, if those are lacking, by a sworn statement from the applicant; in case the company is a newly created one and cannot produce the list, it is invited to give a detailed overview of its professional experience by all means,

— a statement of average annual workforce and the number of managerial staff employed during the last three years. In case the company is a newly created one and cannot produce the statement, it is invited to give a detailed overview of its professional capabilities by all means,
— an indication of the educational and professional qualifications of the management of the company, in particular, the persons in charge of the bid.
Each member of consortium and subcontractor shall provide the same documents.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Number of employees: above 40 people with qualifications related to the consulting services featured in this Call of interest and who might be involved in the performance of the contract.

INFO_ADD.P: The applicant must also provide proof that each of the associated independent contractors or companies will put all necessary means at the applicant’s disposal during the execution of the assignment.
Economic operators can participate in the Call of interest on their own or in groups.
An applicant shall submit one single application on its own or as a member of one single group.
The files shall be sent by platform achatpublic.com.
For downloading operations, please refer to the technical documentation available at:
— https://www.achatpublic.com.
Applicants are:

— invited to take account of the vagaries of electronic transmission. They shall ensure that the electronic transmission of their folder is complete and fully completed before the deadline for submission of application,

— authorized to transmit a backup copy either by electronic means (USB stick or CD preferentially) or by paper means. The backup copies must be transmitted in sealed envelopes bearing clearly marked "backup copy and do not open before the deadline for submission of application” and reach the French Development Agency before the deadline for receipt of the tenders. These backup copies must be hand-delivered against receipt on working days, from Monday to Friday, from 09:00 to 12:00 (Paris time) and from 14:00 to 16:00 (Paris time) at the following address:
French Development Agency.
Mail Office
To the attention of SGN/DCP.
5, rue Roland Barthes,
Paris Cedex 12
Here are our recommendations to make a deposit fold on our platform dematerialization:
— check the presence of Java on the workstation (available free of charge on the site java.com-version 7 or 8),

— with an ADSL connection, the company must allow 3 hours or 4 hours for a crease of approximately 300 MB. And 6 hours or more if the fold exceeds 300Mo (the transmission of a ply depends on the performance of the computer station used, Network quality as well as Internet throughput),
— advocate the use of an Ethernet cable to access the Internet and avoid Wifi,
— privilege the location of the files locally and avoid the file server on the internal network of the company,
— the company going through a proxy will have to check with his IT department beforehand if no quota is set up for the uploading of the files,
— the IT department must also check the setting of the antivirus and firewall on the user station,
— the presence of the IT department during the creation and transmission of the fold is strongly recommended.
